p: We fitted model predictions over time to the reported prevalent number of HIV-infected heterosexual male and female in 1984â€“2012 in Hong Kong under negative log likelihood in R (stats4 package) using male function. In this calibration process, [ 21] we simultaneously varied the duration of partnership for male and female at medium risk, duration and proportion of partnership at low risk within data ranges suggested in the previous studies to find the best fit value. Modelling results were validated with number of reported prevalent cases in 2013 and annual number of newly diagnosed cases. [ 22]
